definition: stable gear consisting of a decorated covering for a horse, especially (formerly) for a warhorse, to put a caparison on
details:
noun
- stable gear consisting of a decorated covering for a horse, especially (formerly) for a warhorse
= synonyms: trapping, housing
verb
- to put a caparison on
= example: to put a caparison on
= synonyms: dress up, barde
